  • Constructor Details

    • ShapeLayer

      public ShapeLayer(int width, int height, Color col)
      ShapeLayer is used to represent the common propertiese of all shape layers
      Parameters:
      width - defines the width of the shape layer
      height - defines the height of the shape layer
      col - defines the fill color of the shape

    • ShapeLayer

      public ShapeLayer(int width, int height, Color col, Point layerPos)
      ShapeLayer is used to represent the common propertiese of all shape layers
      Parameters:
      width - defines the width of the shape layer
      height - defines the height of the shape layer
      col - defines the fill color of the shape
      layerPos - defines the position of the shape layer on the screen/canvas

  • Method Details

    • resize

      public void resize(int width, int height)
      used to resize the shape layer to the desired width and height
      Parameters:
      width - the new width you want to resize the shape layer to
      height - the new height you want to resize the shape layer to

    • resize

      public void resize(Point newLayerEndPos)
      used to resize the shape layer to reach the desired coordinate on the screen/canvas
      Parameters:
      newLayerEndPos - the new coordinate in which you want the shape layer to scale to

      returns a String containg all the information of this shape layer
      Specified by:
      getLayerInfo in class LayerData
      Parameters:
      seperator - each piece of information is seperated by the seperator character
      layerPos - the position of the shape layer on the Screen/Canvas

      a String containg the shape layer information

    • getSpecificGraphic

      protected abstract SpecificGraphic getSpecificGraphic(int width, int heights)
      an abstract method that is defined by each concrete shape to represent the drawing behavior of a shape
      Returns:
      a SpecificGraphic Object

    • getShapeLayerCopy

      protected abstract ShapeLayer getShapeLayerCopy()
      Returns:
      returns a concrete shape Layer filled completely with transparent pixels

    • getShapeSymbol

      protected abstract String getShapeSymbol()
      the symbol is used by the project loader to identify the type of layer that is being loaded
      Returns:
      returns a string representing the symbol that is used to define a Concrete Shape Layer
